row_vector,matrix.description: Return the product of the diagonal matrix formed from the vector rv and the matrix m, i.e., diag matrix(rv) * m.

matrix.description: The number of columns in the matrix x

ints,reals.description: The log Poisson probability mass of n given rate lambda

matrix.description: The product of the lower triangular portion of x (including the diagonal) times its own transpose; that is, if L is a matrix of the same dimensions as x with L(m,n) equal to x(m,n) for n ≤ m and L(m,n) equal to 0 if n > m, the result is the symmetric matrix L L . This is a specialization of tcrossprod(x) for lower-triangular matrices.

int,real.description: The log loss of predicting probability y hat for binary outcome y ; The log loss function for predicting yˆ ∈ [0, 1] for boolean outcome y ∈ {0, 1} is defined by binary log loss(y, yˆ) = y log yˆ + (1 − y) log(1 − yˆ).
